text.section: In this Part VII the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Applicant" means an individual or a business entity that is, with regard to the land that is the subject of the application:
a title owner, assignee, or contract purchaser of the land;
a trustee that has an interest in the land, other than as a trustee described in a mortgage or deed of trust; or
a holder of a 5% or greater interest in the business entity that has an interest in the land if:
the interest holder is involved significantly in directing the affairs of the business entity, including the disposition of the land; or
the interest holder is engaged in substantive actions specifically pertaining to land development in Howard County as a regular part of the activity of the business entity.

"Applicant" includes:
any other business entity in which an individual or business entity described in paragraph (1) of this subsection holds a 3% or greater interest;
an officer or director of a corporation who actually holds title to, or is the contract purchaser or assignee of, the land that is the subject of an application if:
the corporation is listed on a national securities exchange and the officer or director owns 5% or more of its stock; or
in the case of any other corporation, the officer or director owns any interest in the corporation; or
as to an application for a zoning regulation, any person authorized to sign the application.

text.section:
"Application" means:
an application for a zoning map amendment;
an application for a zoning regulation amendment; or
participation in the adoption and approval of a comprehensive zoning plan by appearing at a public hearing, filing a statement in an official record, or engaging in other similar communication to an elected official, where the intent is to change the classification or increase the density of the land of the applicant.
"Candidate" means a candidate for election as Howard County Executive or to the Howard County Council who becomes an elected official.
"Contribution" means any payment or transfer of money or property or the incurring of any liability or promise of anything of value to the treasurer of a candidate, a political committee, or a slate.
"Contributor" means an individual or business entity that makes a contribution.
"Elected official" means an individual who serves as Howard County Executive or as a member of the Howard County Council.

section.section:
"Engaging in business" means entering into any:
sale, purchase, lease, or other transaction involving goods, services, or real property; or
contract, award, loan, extension of credit, or any other financial transaction.

"Engaging in business" does not include the sale of goods to an individual for the use or consumption of the individual or others for personal, family, or household purposes, as distinguished from industrial, commercial, or agricultural purposes.

text.section: "Family member" means the spouse or child of either an applicant or a party of record who has made a contribution with the knowledge and consent of the applicant or party of record.

"Party of record" means an individual or business entity that participates in a map amendment proceeding by the County Council or the zoning board, or who participates in the adoption and approval of a comprehensive zoning plan by appearing at a public hearing, filing a statement in an official record, or engaging in other similar communication to an elected official where the intent is to oppose a change in classification or an increase in density of the land of an applicant.
"Political committee" means a committee, continuing or noncontinuing, specifically created to promote the candidacy of a person running for elective office.
"Slate" means a group, combination, or organization of candidates created under the provisions of the Election Law Article.

section.section: "Treasurer" has the meaning provided in § 1-101 of the Election Law Article.
